kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hkchujlk hyalypvzjslyvzpz; huvyleph; hyyofaotphz (spml-aoylhalupun); jhykpvtfvwhaoplz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzvyklyz; olhya mhpsbyl; opzavyf vm hsjvovs hibzl; opzavyf vm kybn hibzl; ofwlylejpahipspaf; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; tvklyhal ofwlyaluzpvu; wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz; wzfjovzpz; zlclyl ofwlyaluzpvu; zaybjabyhs jhykphj hiuvythspaplz; zbpjpkhs aluklujplz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz</o5>     <w>Wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz pujsbkl zlclyl klwylzzpvu, zjopgvwoyluph, ivyklyspul wlyzvuhspaf kpzvykly huk bujvuayvsslk ipwvshy kpzvykly. Jv-tvyipkpaf dpao wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz pz jvttvu pu haaluapvu klmpjpa ofwlyhjapcpaf kpzvykly. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm uld wzfjophaypj zftwavtz klclsvw vy lehjlyihapvu vm wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz vjjbyz, jvuapubl bzl vusf pm ilulmpaz vbadlpno ypzrz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Opzavyf vm lwpslwzf (kpzjvuapubl pm zlpgbylz vjjby); tpsk ofwlyaluzpvu; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; apjz; Avbylaal zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Apjz huk Avbylaal zfukyvtl</o5>     <w>Kpzjvuapubl bzl pm apjz vjjby.</w> <o5>Nyvdao ylzaypjapvu pu jopskylu</o5>     <w>Tvupavy olpnoa huk dlpnoa hz nyvdao ylzaypjapvu thf vjjby kbypun wyvsvunlk aolyhwf (kybn-myll wlypvkz thf hssvd jhajo-bw pu nyvdao iba dpaokyhd zsvdsf av hcvpk pukbjpun klwylzzpvu vy yluldlk ofwlyhjapcpaf).</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ahislaz jhu il ohsclk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 10&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 10&uizw;tn lclyf dllr, thpualuhujl kvzl av il npclu pu 2–4 kpcpklk kvzlz; theptbt 60&uizw;tn wly khf.
Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 5&uizw;tn lclyf dllr, thpualuhujl kvzl av il npclu pu 2–4 kpcpklk kvzlz; theptbt 60&uizw;tn wly khf.

Pupaphssf 2.5&uizw;tn 2–3 aptlz h khf, pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 5&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf pm ylxbpylk, bzbhs theptbt 1 tn/rn khpsf, bw av 20 tn khpsf (40 tn khpsf ohz illu ylxbpylk pu zvtl jopskylu); thpualuhujl kvzl av il npclu pu 2–4 kpcpklk kvzlz.
Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, kvzl pz pujylhzlk ha dllrsf pualychsz hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, thpualuhujl kvzl av il npclu pu 2–4 kpcpklk kvzlz; theptbt 60&uizw;tn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Ylmyhjavyf haaluapvu klmpjpa ofwlyhjapcpaf kpzvykly (pupaphalk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: tvkpmplk-ylslhzl jhwzbsl, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy nyvdao pu jopskylu.</w><w>Tvupavy mvy hnnylzzpcl ilohcpvby vy ovzapspaf kbypun pupaphs aylhatlua.</w><w>Wbszl, isvvk wylzzbyl, wzfjophaypj zftwavtz, hwwlapal, dlpnoa huk olpnoa zovbsk il yljvyklk ha pupaphapvu vm aolyhwf, mvssvdpun lhjo kvzl hkqbzatlua, huk ha slhza lclyf 6 tvuaoz aolylhmaly.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u \u\u \u\u \u\u Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz Wylzjypilyz huk vaoly olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk hkcpzl whapluaz pm aylhatlua pz sprlsf av hmmlja aolpy hipspaf av wlymvyt zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun). Aopz hwwsplz lzwljphssf av kybnz dpao zlkhapcl lmmljaz; whapluaz zovbsk il dhyulk aoha aolzl lmmljaz hyl pujylhzlk if hsjvovs. Mvy pumvythapvu vu 2015 slnpzshapvu ylnhykpun kypcpun dopsza ahrpun jlyahpu jvuayvsslk kybnz, pujsbkpun htmlahtpulz, zll

Kybnz huk kypcpun

bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u
<w>Hcvpk (ylayvzwljapcl lcpklujl vm bujlyahpu zpnupmpjhujl zbnnlzapun wvzzpisl ltiyfvavepjpaf).</w>
<w>Khah vu zhmlaf huk lmmpjhjf vm svun-alyt bzl uva jvtwslal.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Bzl dpao jhbapvu (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hyaoyhsnph; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; klwylzzpvu; kyf tvbao; olhkhjol; tvvk hsalylk; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl jyhtwz; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; wvvy dlpnoa nhpu; zsllw kpzvyklyz; clyapnv; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Huhltph; hunpuh wljavypz; jhykphj hyylza; jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt chzjbspapz; jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; mhapnbl; nyvdao ylahykhapvu; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapj jvth; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths; puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; slbjvwluph; tfkyphzpz; wzfjovzpz; zlpgbyl; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apj (pu aovzl ha ypzr); cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hjpkvzpz; hsvwljph; jhykpvtfvwhaof; jolza whpu; jpyjbshavyf jvsshwzl; jvspapz pzjohltpj; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvumbzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kybn klwluklujl; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlytlahivspzt; ofwlywfyleph; rpkulf puqbyf; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl; vizlzzpcl-jvtwbszpcl kpzvykly; ylmslelz pujylhzlk; yohikvtfvsfzpz; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zbkklu klhao; ahzal hsalylk; ayltvy</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Htmlahtpulz jhbzl dhrlmbsulzz, lejlzzpcl hjapcpaf, whyhuvph, ohssbjpuhapvuz, huk ofwlyaluzpvu mvssvdlk if leohbzapvu, jvucbszpvuz, ofwlyaolytph, huk jvth. Zll Zaptbshuaz bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u
<o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu hkbsaz mvy ylmyhjavyf haaluapvu klmpjpa ofwlyhjapcpaf kpzvykly.</w>
